verses.verse: And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> had <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>. And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, unto the <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>, to the <S%H2205>elders<s%>, and to them that brought <S%H539>up<s%> <S%H256>Ahab's<s%> children, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Now as soon as this <S%H5612>letter<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> to you, seeing your <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> are with you, and there are with you <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H5483>horses<s%>, a <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> also, and <S%H5402>armour<s%>;

Look even <S%H7200>out<s%> the <S%H2896>best<s%> and <S%H3477>meetest<s%> of your <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> him on his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%>, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> for your <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But they were <S%H3966%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> not <S%H6440>before<s%> him: how then shall we <S%H5975>stand<s%>?

And he that was over the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and he that was over the <S%H5892>city<s%>, the <S%H2205>elders<s%> also, and the bringers <S%H539>up<s%> of the children, <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H3058>Jehu<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, We are thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and will <S%H6213>do<s%> all that thou shalt <S%H559>bid<s%> us; we will not make <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%>: <S%H6213>do<s%> thou that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

Then he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> a <S%H5612>letter<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%> to them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If ye be mine, and if ye will <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> ye the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> your <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> to me to <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> by to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> this <S%H6256>time<s%>. Now the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, being <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>persons<s%>, were with the great <S%H1419>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, which brought them <S%H1431>up<s%>.

And it came to pass, when the <S%H5612>letter<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to them, that they <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H7819>slew<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>persons<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> in <S%H1731>baskets<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> him them to <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.

¶ And there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, They have <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7760>Lay<s%> ye them in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6652>heaps<s%> at the entering <S%H6607>in<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, that he went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%>, Ye be <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: behold, I <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against my <S%H113>master<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> him: but who <S%H5221>slew<s%> all these?

<S%H3045>Know<s%> <S%H645>now<s%> that there shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> unto the <S%H776>earth<s%> nothing of the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> concerning the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> that which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%>.

So <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> all that <S%H7604>remained<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>, and all his great <S%H1419>men<s%>, and his <S%H3045>kinsfolks<s%>, and his <S%H3548>priests<s%>, until he <S%H7604>left<s%> him none <S%H8300>remaining<s%>.
¶ And he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H935>departed<s%>, and <S%H3212>came<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>. And as he was at the <S%H7462>shearing<s%> <S%H1004%H1044>house<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>,

<S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H4672>met<s%> with the <S%H251>brethren<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Who are ye? And they <S%H559>answered<s%>, We are the <S%H251>brethren<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%>; and we go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7965>salute<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H1377>queen<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8610>Take<s%> them <S%H2416>alive<s%>. And they <S%H8610>took<s%> them <S%H2416>alive<s%>, and <S%H7819>slew<s%> them at the <S%H953>pit<s%> of the shearing <S%H1044>house<s%>, even <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>; neither <S%H7604>left<s%> he <S%H376>any<s%> of them.

¶ And when he was <S%H3212>departed<s%> thence, he <S%H4672>lighted<s%> on <S%H3082>Jehonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> coming to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him: and he <S%H1288>saluted<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3426>Is<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3477>right<s%>, as my <S%H3824>heart<s%> is with thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>? And <S%H3082>Jehonadab<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, It <S%H3426>is<s%>. If it be, <S%H5414>give<s%> me thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>. And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and he took him <S%H5927>up<s%> to him into the <S%H4818>chariot<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%> with me, and <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H7068>zeal<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. So they made him <S%H7392>ride<s%> in his <S%H7393>chariot<s%>.

And when he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, he <S%H5221>slew<s%> all that <S%H7604>remained<s%> unto <S%H256>Ahab<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, till he had <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> him, according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baal<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%>; but <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him <S%H7235>much<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H7121>call<s%> unto me all the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, all his <S%H5647>servants<s%>, and all his <S%H3548>priests<s%>; let <S%H376>none<s%> be <S%H6485>wanting<s%>: for I have a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> to do to <S%H1168>Baal<s%>; whosoever shall be <S%H6485>wanting<s%>, he shall not <S%H2421>live<s%>. But <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> it in <S%H6122>subtilty<s%>, to the intent that he might <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H5647>worshippers<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>.
And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6942>Proclaim<s%> a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal<s%>. And they <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> it.

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> through all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and all the <S%H5647>worshippers<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, so that there was not a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> not. And they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>; and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> from one <S%H6310>end<s%> to <S%H6310>another<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him that was over the <S%H4458>vestry<s%>, Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3830>vestments<s%> for all the <S%H5647>worshippers<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>. And he brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4403>vestments<s%>.

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H935>went<s%>, and <S%H3082>Jehonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%>, into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5647>worshippers<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, <S%H2664>Search<s%>, and <S%H7200>look<s%> that there <S%H3426>be<s%> here with you none of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, but the <S%H5647>worshippers<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> only.

And when they went <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> and burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, If <S%H376>any<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> whom I have <S%H935>brought<s%> into your <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%>, he that letteth him go, his <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of him.

And it came to pass, as soon as he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6213>offering<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, that <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H7323>guard<s%> and to the <S%H7991>captains<s%>, Go <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H5221>slay<s%> them; let <S%H376>none<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%>. And they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and the <S%H7323>guard<s%> and the <S%H7991>captains<s%> cast them <S%H7993>out<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>.
And they brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H4676>images<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and <S%H8313>burned<s%> them.

And they brake <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4676>image<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and brake <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and <S%H7760>made<s%> it a draught <S%H4163%H4280>house<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
Thus <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H1168>Baal<s%> out of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ Howbeit from the <S%H2399>sins<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>, who made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%>, <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> not from <S%H310>after<s%> them, to wit, the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5695>calves<s%> that were in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, and that were in <S%H1835>Dan<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3058>Jehu<s%>, Because thou hast done <S%H2895>well<s%> in <S%H6213>executing<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and hast <S%H6213>done<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> according to all that was in mine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, thy <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> generation shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

But <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> took no <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with all his <S%H3824>heart<s%>: for he <S%H5493>departed<s%> not from the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>, which made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%>.

¶ In those <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H7096>cut<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7096>short<s%>: and <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> them in all the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

From <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217%H8121>eastward<s%>, all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and the <S%H4520>Manassites<s%>, from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, which is by the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, even <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%>, and all that he <S%H6213>did<s%>, and all his <S%H1369>might<s%>, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697%H3117>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

And <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>: and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>. And <S%H3059>Jehoahaz<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead.
And the <S%H3117>time<s%> that <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
